org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Interface Reactor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommonReactor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockingReactor, Facility, IsolationReactor, NonBlockingReactor, ReactorBase, SwingBoundReactor, ThreadBoundReactor

    public interface Reactor
extends Closeable, Blade
    The Reactor interface identifies the processing methods that can be used by applications.

    • Method Detail

      • asReactorImpl

        ReactorImpl asReactorImpl()

      • isInboxEmpty

        boolean isInboxEmpty()
        Returns true when there are no more messages in the inbox. This method is generally only called by a processing's onIdle task to determine when to return so that an incoming message can be processed.
        Returns:
        True when the inbox is empty.
